channel.name: Bloomberg TV US
channel.title: The Circuit
channel.desc: Meghan, the Duchess of Sussex, opens up in a wide-ranging interview with Emily Chang about life beyond the royal spotlight and her latest ventures in business and entertainment.

channel.name: Bloomberg TV US
channel.title: Working Capital
channel.desc: In a historic year for global elections, Olivia Nuzzi interviews prominent American political and business leaders on location to candidly discuss the nation's most urgent challenges.
